name: Work
description: Deterministic coding workflows (new/task/review/fix/ship/merge/upstream) executed via Lobster with approval gates.

lobsterPath.description: Absolute path to the lobster binary. Omit to use PATH.

coderSessionKey.description: Session key used for sandboxed exec via /tools/invoke (default: agent:coder:main).

maxFixLoops.description: Max fix loops for /work task and /work fix (default: 3).

timeoutMs.description: Default Lobster run timeout for work workflows (default: 1800000).

defaultUpstreamRepo.description: Default upstream owner/name for /work upstream (default: openclaw/openclaw).

keepWorkflowFiles.description: Keep local .github/workflows authoritative during upstream sync (default: true).
